mapper.select: select roomId from chatroom where masterNickname=#{masterNickname} and userNickname = #{userNickname} and post_seq=#{post_seq};
mapper.insert: insert into chatroom (masterNickname, userNickname, postPic, post_seq, roomId) values(#{masterNickname}, #{userNickname}, #{postPic} ,#{post_seq},#{roomId});
mapper.select: select saved_file_name from user_profile_photo where user_seq = #{user_seq};
mapper.update: update chatroom set unReadCount=#{unReadCount} where roomId = #{roomId} ;
mapper.insert: insert into chatmessage (roomId, sessionCount, name, message, time) values(#{roomId}, #{sessionCount}, #{name}, #{message},#{time} );
mapper.update: update post set pay_status=#{pay_status} where post_seq=#{post_seq};
